channel.title: Project Extient hire thread
channel.description:
Hello, Im Hippyss creator and coder of Project Extient, Im making this thread for one and only one reason Project Extient is having another world added onto it's servers (World Disarray), and i can't have my small staff manage two servers at once, so im hiring new people :D. List of Requirements for the Job(s)
[ul][li]Must be Loyal and NOT corrupt Ex.selling admin/mod accounts.[/li] [li]Must be active[/li] [li]Must be polite and use proper grammar. Ex. You not "U"[/li][/ul]
[b]Format[/b] [code]Name: Position wanted (mod,admin): Why Should i pick you?: Have you any experence in this position?: Are you polite?: Way to contact you (ex.msn): Other stuff: [/code] Please take the time to apply! Thank you, Hippyss

item.title: Project Extient hire thread
item.dc:creator: @hippyss hippyss
item.description:
@hippyss wrote:

[quote=“i blkwolf i, post:9, topic:105451”]yes, i will im usually on everyday(unless grounded) but im usually not and i only really like 1 server and its hardly up lol[/quote]Okay I’ll give you a shot. Accepted.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Extient hire thread
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Name:I Blkwolf I
Position wanted (mod,admin):Admin
Why Should i pick you?: i give people chances and i enforce rules i give warnings 1st so they know
Have you any experence in this position?:yes im admin on 3 other servers
Are you polite?:yes
Way to contact you (ex.msn):Twm1995@hotmail.com
Other stuff:im very nice to people and i try to help out anyway i can if possible i have never got into trouble
Ty for reading this post

Read full topic
